testingRequirements.description: All user stories must pass tests before being marked as complete
testingRequirements.documentation: See TESTING.md for full testing requirements

userStories.title: Create Friend data model and types
userStories.description: Define TypeScript interfaces for Friend entity and create a composable for managing friends state
acceptanceCriteria: Friend interface with id (string), name (string), lastContact (number/timestamp)
Composable provides: friends ref, addFriend, removeFriend, updateLastContact functions

userStories.title: Implement localStorage persistence
userStories.description: Add persistence to useFriends composable so friends list survives browser refresh
acceptanceCriteria: Friends array saved to localStorage on every change
Friends loaded from localStorage on app init

userStories.title: Create color calculation utility
userStories.description: Utility function to determine indicator color based on lastContact timestamp

userStories.title: Create FriendTile component
userStories.description: Vue component displaying a single friend with name and color indicator
acceptanceCriteria: Displays circular color indicator (traffic light style)
Indicator color determined by getContactColor utility
Colors update reactively over time (green → yellow → red)
Styled with CSS (no external UI library needed)

userStories.title: Create FriendsGrid component
userStories.description: Grid container component that displays all friend tiles
acceptanceCriteria: Responsive: 4 columns on desktop, 2 on mobile
Shows empty state message when no friends

userStories.title: Create AddFriendForm component
userStories.description: Simple form to add a new friend by name
acceptanceCriteria: Add button (or Enter key) to submit

userStories.title: Integrate components in App.vue
userStories.description: Wire up all components in main App.vue with useFriends composable

userStories.title: Add delete friend functionality
userStories.description: Allow users to remove friends from the list
acceptanceCriteria: FriendTile has delete button (small X or trash icon)
Clicking delete removes friend from list
Confirmation optional but nice to have

userStories.title: Polish styling and UX
userStories.description: Final styling pass to match mockup aesthetic

userStories.title: Deploy to Render.com
userStories.description: Deploy the Friends Radar app to Render.com for public access
acceptanceCriteria: Verify app loads and works online
Update README with live demo link

userStories.title: Add PWA support with notifications
userStories.description: Make Friends Radar installable as a PWA with push notifications for overdue contacts
acceptanceCriteria: Create app manifest with proper metadata
Generate PWA icons in multiple sizes (192x192, 512x512)
Smart notifications when friends are overdue (21+ seconds/days)
Notifications work on both desktop and mobile

userStories.title: Implement comprehensive testing suite
userStories.description: Add unit and component tests with automated test running in build process
acceptanceCriteria: Install Vitest and Vue Test Utils
Write unit tests for useFriends composable
Fix color transition bug (green → yellow → red)
Update build script to run tests automatically
npm run build requires tests to pass

userStories.title: Set up CI/CD with GitHub Actions
userStories.description: Automate testing and deployment with GitHub Actions workflow
acceptanceCriteria: Run tests on every push and pull request
Run tests on multiple Node.js versions (18.x, 20.x)
Type check with TypeScript on CI
Add GitHub Actions badge to README
Optional: Deploy to GitHub Pages on main branch
